cu.explanation_en: Setting mcc to -1 (negative value) will cause invalid PLMN configuration error and cell identity failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting nrofDownlinkSlots to 15 (exceeds maximum allowed slots) will cause invalid TDD configuration error and frame structure failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 nrofDownlinkSlots 設定為 15（超過允許的最大時隙數）會導致無效 TDD 配置錯誤，並造成幀結構失敗。
